## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G19680](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G19680)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PP1R3</u>
- **Gene Name:** PROTEIN PHOSPATASE 1 REGULATORY SUBUNIT 3
- **Description:**   Leucine-rich repeat (LRR) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2183144
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [pp1r3-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Hypersensitive to ABA and salt stress, incresed drought tolerance. pp1r3 mutants showed reduced seed germination and cotyledon greening, slower seedling growth after treatment with ABA.Under high-salinity conditions reduced germination and cotyledon greening.
   - [pp1r3-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Hypersensitive to ABA and salt stress, incresed drought tolerance. pp1r3 mutants showed reduced seed germination and cotyledon greening, slower seedling growth after treatment with ABA.Under high-salinity conditions reduced germination and cotyledon greening.
